name: CO2 Partners
overview:
CO2 Partners, based in Minneapolis, Minnesota, provides executive coaching and business coaching services.

Founded in 2004 by Gary B Cohen, CO2 Partners coaches and practitioners understand the realities of leadership and direction. Their intuition and “street smarts” lend a unique credibility and integrity to our work; itâ€™s not about textbook theory, itâ€™s about grounded, real-world experiences they generously share with clients.

More importantly, leaders and organizations see rapid and sustainable returns on their investment. Outcomes are measurable and meaningful. Our fresh perspectives uncover new possibilities, solve problems from different angles, and deliver the skills and courage you need to succeed â€“ even when the summit looks insurmountable.
